projectGridLines.stationName: GTM Buddy Software private limited - Customer Success
projectGridLines.title: Drive Customer Success initiatives
projectGridLines.description:
Description: SOTA AI capabilities to help Sales Reps win more deals by providing

insights and recommendations on next best actions.

Skill sets: Research on B2B sales and enablement. Creation of content for customer

education which includes AI tools for video, and content creation.

Traits expectation: Strategy for customer communication, Business understanding,

interest towards customer marketing.

Expected learning: Saas, B2B business, Strategies in B2B Sales, Customer success

workflows. Customer Education strategies. Exposure to tools used by the Sales team and

hands-on experience with tools used by the Customer Success team.

Specific courses required for project execution: Basics of B2B Sales, Introduction to

Customer Success.
